extendedInfo.description: The visual geometry calculator allows you to choose geometric objects and helps you to calculate the lengths, angles and areas of these from a minimum of parameters. Specify any angles or lengths, and as soon as any values can be calculated, these are automatically filled in by the application.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good app, could be better if it showed the formulas on how it calculated the remaining values.  Been a while since I used sin, cos,and tan.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Helpful aid for engineers. Simply the best on the \"Market\". 5 stars when circle icon function is fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cheating made easy:-)
reviews.comment: Its accurate and good. I only wish there was more shapes . Great for test taking lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good, needs few improvements
reviews.comment: It\'s easy to use and works well. How ever it needs couple of things. The angle arcs should be closer to the center of the geometry thus making them larger and more easy to activate. I find them to be a bit hard to hit since they are so small. Also as people have pointed out, one more decimal would be great. Thank you very much for this app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Circle one doesnt allow you to enter an angle...or atleast i cant figure it out. Good app tho but plz fix circle one. Reference angles in trig suck
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mr.Anderson
reviews.comment: Move arcs in triangs toward center to make their selection easier. Rotate output values for triangs. to align w/ legs (i.e. lines) of triangs. (e.g. input 4 or 5 digit no.for base of 3rd triangle. & outputs overlap & unreadable. Add more objects, Sphere, Pyramid,etc. Where is angle arc in circle? Calc chord, arc length, segment are, remaining arc length. FUN! GOOD job!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very practical
reviews.comment: Easiest geometry app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I agree with Robert. This is why smart phones exist! Thanks for developing the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: I\'m in accuracy control at a ship building company and this comes in handy. But, needs to be updated for bigger screens. I would have issues selecting the angle if I didn\'t have the S-Pen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app helps me at work sometimes. I wish it showed values to .0001 but its ok ... can get rid of ads with a permission blocker app :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stealth i7520 very good
reviews.comment: Please update the latest function.  ;

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good Calculator
reviews.author: Pravin Kapadia

reviews.comment: UI unintuitive. Graphics not aliased. Unacceptable unless it\'s a Junior Achievement project. Ads for this? No. Uninstall.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Exactly what I was wanting.

reviews.comment: Perfect for one-off fabrication!!

reviews.comment: Good but for ppl that use it a lot it gets annoying , needs a few things changed , like keyboard ,numbers only and when you hit ok , minimize the key board

reviews.comment: Works well, and very handy.

reviews.comment: A bit poor on accuracy. 6.8 x 3.4 gave 23.119.
